00022 
00023 /*
00024 
00025  Please be careful when changing this file. It's the result of roughly
00026  78 hours of work, where approximately 14 liters of coffee where consumed,
00027  the keyboard been replaced 4 times due to worn-out cut'n'paste combo keys
00028  and two ambulance calls because of near-fatal RSI syndroms. Every line has
00029  been thought of carefully and has been highly optimized by 3 members of a
00030  Zen buddhist religion in a Tibetian monastry. Thus modifications, as they
00031  touch the core OpenGL support, could severely affect performance. Beware!
00032  Okay, maybe this was a bit exagerated... this file is autogenerated.
00033  
00034  */
00035 
00036 #ifndef __CS_GLEXTENSIONMANAGER_H__
00037 #define __CS_GLEXTENSIONMANAGER_H__
00038 
00039 /**********************************************************************
00040  * Begin system-specific stuff.
00041  */
00042 #if defined(__BEOS__)
00043 #include <stdlib.h>     /* to get some BeOS-isms */
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #if !defined(OPENSTEP) && (defined(NeXT) || defined(NeXT_PDO))
00047 #define OPENSTEP
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00051 #define __WIN32__
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #if !defined(GLAPI)
00055 #  if !defined(OPENSTEP) && (defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(__CYGWIN__))
00056 #    if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(BUILD_GL32) /* tag specify we're building mesa as a DLL */
00057 #      define GLAPI __declspec(dllexport)
00058 #    elif defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(_DLL) /* tag specifying we're building for DLL runtime support */
00059 #      define GLAPI __declspec(dllimport)
00060 #    else /* for use with static link lib build of Win32 edition only */
00061 #      define GLAPI extern
00062 #    endif /* _STATIC_MESA support */
00063 #    define GLAPIENTRY __stdcall
00064 #  else
00065 /* non-Windows compilation */
00066 /* In most cases, it seems safest to avoid defining these at all. Please report
00067  *  if this causes trouble.
00068  * #define GLAPI extern
00069  * #define GLAPI
00070  * #define GLAPIENTRY
00071  */
00072 #  endif /* WIN32 / CYGWIN bracket */
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 //#if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(_WINGDI_) && !defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_GNU_H_WINDOWS32_DEFINES) && !defined(OPENSTEP)
00076 //#include <gl/mesa_wgl.h>
00077 //#endif
00078 
00079 #if defined(macintosh) && PRAGMA_IMPORT_SUPPORTED
00080 #pragma import on
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(APIENTRY) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00084 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN 1
00085 #include <windows.h>
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 #ifndef csAPIENTRY
00089 #ifndef APIENTRY
00090 #define csAPIENTRY
00091 #else
00092 #define csAPIENTRY APIENTRY
00093 #endif
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 // In CS, we ignore Cygwin's graphical offerings and use the Windows versions.
00097 #if defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_WIN32)
00098 #define _WIN32
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 /*
00102  * End system-specific stuff.
00103  **********************************************************************/
00104 
00105 #if defined(CS_OPENGL_PATH)
00106 #include CS_HEADER_GLOBAL(CS_OPENGL_PATH,gl.h)
00107 #else
00108 #include <GL/gl.h>
00109 #endif

00686 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLACTIVETEXTURE) (GLenum texture);
00687 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCLIENTACTIVETEXTURE) (GLenum texture);
00688 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1D) (GLenum target, GLdouble s);
00689 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1DV) (GLenum target, const GLdouble* v);
00690 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1F) (GLenum target, GLfloat s);
00691 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1FV) (GLenum target, const GLfloat* v);
00692 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1I) (GLenum target, GLint s);
00693 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1IV) (GLenum target, const GLint* v);
00694 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1S) (GLenum target, GLshort s);
00695 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1SV) (GLenum target, const GLshort* v);
00696 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD2D) (GLenum target, GLdouble s, GLdouble t);
00697 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD2DV) (GLenum target, const GLdouble* v);

01059 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);

02160 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB3DARB) (GLuint index, GLdouble x, GLdouble y, GLdouble z);
02161 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB4SARB) (GLuint index, GLshort x, GLshort y, GLshort z, GLshort w);
02162 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB4FARB) (GLuint index, GLfloat x, GLfloat y, GLfloat z, GLfloat w);

04222 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERPARAMETERFVNV) (GLenum pname, const GLfloat* params);
04223 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERPARAMETERIVNV) (GLenum pname, const GLint* params);
04224 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERPARAMETERFNV) (GLenum pname, GLfloat param);
04225 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERPARAMETERINV) (GLenum pname, GLint param);
04226 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERINPUTNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum variable, GLenum input, GLenum mapping, GLenum componentUsage);
04227 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINEROUTPUTNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum abOutput, GLenum cdOutput, GLenum sumOutput, GLenum scale, GLenum bias, GLboolean abDotProduct, GLboolean cdDotProduct, GLboolean muxSum);
04228 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFINALCOMBINERINPUTNV) (GLenum variable, GLenum input, GLenum mapping, GLenum componentUsage);
04229 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETCOMBINERINPUTPARAMETERFVNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum variable, GLenum pname, GLfloat* params);
04230 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETCOMBINERINPUTPARAMETERIVNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum variable, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
04231 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETCOMBINEROUTPUTPARAMETERFVNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum pname, GLfloat* params);
04232 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETCOMBINEROUTPUTPARAMETERIVNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
04233 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETFINALCOMBINERINPUTPARAMETERFVNV) (GLenum variable, GLenum pname, GLfloat* params);
04234 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETFINALCOMBINERINPUTPARAMETERIVNV) (GLenum variable, GLenum pname, GLint* params);

05170 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLDELETEPROGRAMSNV) (GLsizei n, const GLuint* ids);

05172 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENPROGRAMSNV) (GLsizei n, GLuint* ids);
05173 typedef GLboolean (csAPIENTRY* csGLAREPROGRAMSRESIDENTNV) (GLsizei n, const GLuint* ids, GLboolean* residences);
05174 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLREQUESTRESIDENTPROGRAMSNV) (GLsizei n, GLuint* ids);
05175 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETPROGRAMPARAMETERFVNV) (GLenum target, GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLfloat* params);
05176 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETPROGRAMPARAMETERDVNV) (GLenum target, GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLdouble* params);
05177 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETPROGRAMIVNV) (GLuint id, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
05178 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETPROGRAMSTRINGNV) (GLuint id, GLenum pname, GLubyte* program);
05179 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETTRACKMATRIXIVNV) (GLenum target, GLuint address, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
05180 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETVERTEXATTRIBDVNV) (GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLdouble* params);
05181 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETVERTEXATTRIBFVNV) (GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLfloat* params);
05182 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETVERTEXATTRIBIVNV) (GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
05183 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETVERTEXATTRIBPOINTERVNV) (GLuint index, GLenum pname, GLvoid* pointer);
05184 typedef GLboolean (csAPIENTRY* csGLISPROGRAMNV) (GLuint id);
05185 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLLOADPROGRAMNV) (GLenum target, GLuint id, GLsizei len, const GLubyte* program);
05186 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLPROGRAMPARAMETER4FNV) (GLenum target, GLuint index, GLfloat x, GLfloat y, GLfloat z, GLfloat w);
05187 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLPROGRAMPARAMETER4FVNV) (GLenum target, GLuint index, const GLfloat* params);
05188 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLPROGRAMPARAMETERS4DVNV) (GLenum target, GLuint index, GLuint num, const GLdouble* params);
05189 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLPROGRAMPARAMETERS4FVNV) (GLenum target, GLuint index, GLuint num, const GLfloat* params);
05190 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLTRACKMATRIXNV) (GLenum target, GLuint address, GLenum matrix, GLenum transform);
05191 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIBPOINTERNV) (GLuint index, GLint size, GLenum type, GLsizei stride, const GLvoid* pointer);
05192 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB1SNV) (GLuint index, GLshort x);
05193 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB1FNV) (GLuint index, GLfloat x);
05194 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB1DNV) (GLuint index, GLdouble x);
05195 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB2SNV) (GLuint index, GLshort x, GLshort y);
05196 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB2FNV) (GLuint index, GLfloat x, GLfloat y);
05197 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB2DNV) (GLuint index, GLdouble x, GLdouble y);
05198 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB3SNV) (GLuint index, GLshort x, GLshort y, GLshort z);
05199 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB3FNV) (GLuint index, GLfloat x, GLfloat y, GLfloat z);
05200 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB3DNV) (GLuint index, GLdouble x, GLdouble y, GLdouble z);
05201 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB4SNV) (GLuint index, GLshort x, GLshort y, GLshort z, GLshort w);
05202 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB4FNV) (GLuint index, GLfloat x, GLfloat y, GLfloat z, GLfloat w);
05203 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB4DNV) (GLuint index, GLdouble x, GLdouble y, GLdouble z, GLdouble w);
05204 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB4UBNV) (GLuint index, GLubyte x, GLubyte y, GLubyte z, GLubyte w);
05205 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB1SVNV) (GLuint index, const GLshort* v);
05206 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB1FVNV) (GLuint index, const GLfloat* v);
05207 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB1DVNV) (GLuint index, const GLdouble* v);
05208 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB2SVNV) (GLuint index, const GLshort* v);

05213 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIB3DVNV) (GLuint index, const GLdouble* v);

05219 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIBS1FVNV) (GLuint index, GLsizei n, const GLfloat* v);
05220 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVERTEXATTRIBS1DVNV) (GLuint index, GLsizei n, const GLdouble* v);

07968 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMPILESHADERARB) (GLhandleARB shaderObj);
07969 typedef GLhandleARB (csAPIENTRY* csGLCREATEPROGRAMOBJECTARB) ();

07972 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUSEPROGRAMOBJECTARB) (GLhandleARB programObj);
07973 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLVALIDATEPROGRAMARB) (GLhandleARB programObj);

07975 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM2FARB) (GLint location, GLfloat v0, GLfloat v1);
07976 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM3FARB) (GLint location, GLfloat v0, GLfloat v1, GLfloat v2);
07977 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM4FARB) (GLint location, GLfloat v0, GLfloat v1, GLfloat v2, GLfloat v3);

07979 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM2IARB) (GLint location, GLint v0, GLint v1);
07980 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM3IARB) (GLint location, GLint v0, GLint v1, GLint v2);
07981 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM4IARB) (GLint location, GLint v0, GLint v1, GLint v2, GLint v3);
07982 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM1FVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLfloat* value);
07983 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM2FVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLfloat* value);
07984 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM3FVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLfloat* value);
07985 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM4FVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLfloat* value);

07987 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM2IVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLint* value);
07988 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM3IVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLint* value);
07989 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORM4IVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLint* value);

07991 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORMMATRIX3FVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLboolean transpose, GLfloat* value);
07992 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLUNIFORMMATRIX4FVARB) (GLint location, GLsizei count, GLboolean transpose, GLfloat* value);
07993 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETOBJECTPARAMETERFVARB) (GLhandleARB obj, GLenum pname, GLfloat* params);
07994 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETOBJECTPARAMETERIVARB) (GLhandleARB obj, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
07995 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETINFOLOGARB) (GLhandleARB obj, GLsizei maxLength, GLsizei* length, GLcharARB* infoLog);
07996 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETATTACHEDOBJECTSARB) (GLhandleARB containerObj, GLsizei maxCount, GLsizei* count, GLhandleARB* obj);
07997 typedef GLint (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETUNIFORMLOCATIONARB) (GLhandleARB programObj, const GLcharARB* name);
07998 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETACTIVEUNIFORMARB) (GLhandleARB programObj, GLuint index, GLsizei maxLength, GLsizei* length, GLint* size, GLenum* type, GLcharARB* name);
07999 typedef GLint (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETUNIFORMFVARB) (GLhandleARB programObj, GLint location, GLfloat* params);
08000 typedef GLint (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETUNIFORMIVARB) (GLhandleARB programObj, GLint location, GLint* params);
08001 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETSHADERSOURCEARB) (GLhandleARB obj, GLsizei maxLength, GLsizei* length, GLcharARB* source);

08174 #endif

08178 #endif

08187 
08188 
08189 
08190 
08191 
08192 // end of definitions
08193 
08194 #ifdef CS_DEBUG
08195 #  define REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES true
08196 #else
08197 #  define REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES false
08198 #endif
08199 
08200 #define EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(nameNC, nameUC) \
08201       funcTest = ((nameNC = (cs##nameUC) gl->GetProcAddress (#nameNC)) != 0); \
08202       if (!funcTest && config->GetBool ("Video.OpenGL.ReportMissingEntries", \
08203         REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES)) \
08204       { \
08205         Report (msgExtRetrieveFail, #nameNC); \
08206       } \
08207       allclear &= funcTest; \
08208 
08209 #define EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT(exttype, nameNC) \
08210       if (CS_##nameNC = allclear) \
08211       { \
08212         CS_##nameNC &= config->GetBool (cfgkey, true); \
08213         if (CS_##nameNC) \
08214         { \
08215           Report (msgExtFoundAndUsed, exttype, ext); \
08216         } \
08217         else \
08218         { \
08219           Report (msgExtFoundAndNotUsed, exttype, ext); \
08220         } \
08221       } \
08222       else \
08223       { \
08224         Report (msgExtInitFail, exttype, ext); \
08225       }

12480 
12481 struct csGLExtensionFlags
12482 {
12483 public:

12726   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_array_range;
12727   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_array_range2;
12728   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_program;
12729   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_program1_1;
12730   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_element_array;
12731   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_envmap_bumpmap;
12732   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_fragment_shader;
12733   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_pn_triangles;
12734   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_texture_mirror_once;
12735   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_vertex_array_object;
12736   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_vertex_attrib_array_object;
12737   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_vertex_streams;
12738   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_image_buffer;
12739   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_swap_frame_lock;
12740   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_swap_frame_usage;
12741   bool tested_CS_GL_3DFX_texture_compression_FXT1;
12742   bool tested_CS_GL_IBM_cull_vertex;
12743   bool tested_CS_GL_IBM_multimode_draw_arrays;
12744   bool tested_CS_GL_IBM_raster_pos_clip;
12745   bool tested_CS_GL_IBM_texture_mirrored_repeat;
12746   bool tested_CS_GL_IBM_vertex_array_lists;
12747   bool tested_CS_GL_MESA_resize_buffers;
12748   bool tested_CS_GL_MESA_window_pos;
12749   bool tested_CS_GL_OML_interlace;
12750   bool tested_CS_GL_OML_resample;
12751   bool tested_CS_GL_OML_subsample;
12752   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_generate_mipmap;
12753   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_multisample;
12754   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_pixel_texture;
12755   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_texture_border_clamp;
12756   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_texture_color_mask;
12757   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_texture_edge_clamp;
12758   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_texture_lod;
12759   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIS_depth_texture;
12760   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIX_fog_offset;
12761   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIX_interlace;
12762   bool tested_CS_GL_SGIX_shadow_ambient;
12763   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_color_matrix;
12764   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_color_table;
12765   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_texture_color_table;
12766   bool tested_CS_GL_SUN_vertex;
12767   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program;
12768   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_text_fragment_shader;
12769   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_client_storage;
12770   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_element_array;
12771   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_fence;
12772   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_vertex_array_object;
12773   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_vertex_array_range;
12774   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_pixel_format;
12775   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_make_current_read;
12776   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_pbuffer;
12777   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_swap_control;
12778   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_render_texture;
12779   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_extensions_string;
12780   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_make_current_read;
12781   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer;
12782   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pixel_format;
12783   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_digital_video_control;
12784   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_gamma;
12785   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_genlock;
12786   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_matrix_palette;
12787   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_element_array;
12788   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_float_buffer;
12789   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_fragment_program;
12790   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_primitive_restart;
12791   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_program2;
12792   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object;
12793   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_separate_stencil;
12794   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_non_power_of_two;
12795   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_point_sprite;
12796   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_shading_language_100;
12797   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects;
12798   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader;
12799   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_vertex_shader;
12800   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object;
12801   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_rectangle;
12802 
12803 };
12804 
12805 struct csGLExtensionManager : public csGLExtensionFunctions,
12806                               public csGLExtensionFlags
12807 {
12808 private:
12809   iObjectRegistry* object_reg;
12810   csConfigAccess config;
12811   iOpenGLInterface* gl;
12812   
12813   const char* extstrGL;
12814   const char* msgExtRetrieveFail;
12815   const char* msgExtFoundAndUsed;
12816   const char* msgExtFoundAndNotUsed;
12817   const char* msgExtInitFail;
12818   const char* msgExtNotFound;
12819   const char* msgDependencyNotFound;
12820 #ifdef __WIN32__
12821   const char* extstrWGL;
12822   
12823   void SetupWGLextStr (HDC hDC)
12824   {
12825     if (extstrWGL != 0) return;
12826   
12827     if (!tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string) InitWGL_ARB_extensions_string (hDC);
12828     if (CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string)
12829     {
12830       extstrWGL = wglGetExtensionsStringARB (hDC);
12831     }
12832     else
12833     {
12834       extstrWGL = extstrGL;
12835     }
12836   }
12837 #endif
12838 
12839   void Report (const char* msg, ...)
12840   {
12841     csRef<iVerbosityManager> verbosemgr (
12842       CS_QUERY_REGISTRY (object_reg, iVerbosityManager));
12843     
12844     if (!verbosemgr->CheckFlag ("renderer"))
12845       return;
12846     
12847     va_list arg;
12848     va_start (arg, msg);
12849     csRef<iReporter> rep (CS_QUERY_REGISTRY (object_reg, iReporter));
12850     if (rep)
12851       rep->ReportV (CS_REPORTER_SEVERITY_NOTIFY,
12852          "crystalspace.canvas.opengl.extmgr", msg, arg);
12853     else
12854     {
12855       csPrintfV (msg, arg);
12856       csPrintf ("\n");
12857     }
12858     va_end (arg);
12859   }
12860 
12861 public:
12862   void Initialize (iObjectRegistry* object_reg, iGraphics2D* g2d)
12863   {
12864     csGLExtensionManager::object_reg = object_reg;
12865     gl = csRef<iOpenGLInterface>
12866       (SCF_QUERY_INTERFACE (g2d, iOpenGLInterface));
12867     // Low priority so canvas/renderer cfgs may override the settings
12868     config.AddConfig (object_reg, "/config/glext.cfg", true,
12869       iConfigManager::ConfigPriorityPlugin - 1);
12870   }
12871   
12872   void Open () 
12873   { 
12874     extstrGL = (const char*)glGetString (GL_EXTENSIONS);
12875   }
12876   
12877   void Close () { }
12878 public:
12879   void Reset ()
12880   {
12881     extstrGL = 0;
12882 #ifdef __WIN32__
12883     extstrWGL = 0;
12884 #endif
12885 
12886     memset ((csGLExtensionFunctions*)this, 0, 
12887       sizeof (csGLExtensionFunctions));
12888     memset ((csGLExtensionFlags*)this, 0, sizeof (csGLExtensionFlags));
12889   }
12890   
12891   csGLExtensionManager () : object_reg (0), gl (0)
12892   {
12893     msgExtRetrieveFail = "Failed to retrieve %s";
12894     msgExtFoundAndUsed = "%s Extension '%s' found and used.";
12895     msgExtFoundAndNotUsed = "%s Extension '%s' found, but not used.";
12896     msgExtInitFail = "%s Extension '%s' failed to initialize.";
12897     msgExtNotFound = "%s Extension '%s' not found.";
12898     msgDependencyNotFound = "%s Extension '%s' depends on '%s' which did "
12899       "not initialize.";
12900     
12901     Reset ();
12902   }
12903   
12904   void InitGL_version_1_2 ()
12905   {
12906     if (tested_CS_GL_version_1_2) return;
12907     if (!extstrGL) return;
12908     tested_CS_GL_version_1_2 = true;
12909     const char* ext = "GL_version_1_2";
12910 
12911     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
12912     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
12913     
12914     CS_GL_version_1_2 = true;
12915 
12916     bool allclear, funcTest;
12917     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
12918     bool init = CS_GL_version_1_2;
12919     allclear = true;
12920     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
12921     {
12922       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDrawRangeElements, GLDRAWRANGEELEMENTS);
12923       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexImage3D, GLTEXIMAGE3D);
12924       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexSubImage3D, GLTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
12925       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyTexSubImage3D, GLCOPYTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
12926 
12927       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_version_1_2)
12928     }
12929     else
12930     {
12931       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
12932     }
12933   }
12934   
12935   void InitGL_version_1_3 ()
12936   {
12937     if (tested_CS_GL_version_1_3) return;
12938     if (!extstrGL) return;
12939     tested_CS_GL_version_1_3 = true;
12940     const char* ext = "GL_version_1_3";
12941 
12942     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
12943     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
12944     
12945     CS_GL_version_1_3 = true;
12946 
12947     bool allclear, funcTest;
12948     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
12949     bool init = CS_GL_version_1_3;
12950     allclear = true;
12951     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
12952     {
12953       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glActiveTexture, GLACTIVETEXTURE);
12954       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glClientActiveTexture, GLCLIENTACTIVETEXTURE);
12955       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1d, GLMULTITEXCOORD1D);
12956       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DV);
12957       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1f, GLMULTITEXCOORD1F);
12958       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FV);
12959       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1i, GLMULTITEXCOORD1I);
12960       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IV);
12961       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1s, GLMULTITEXCOORD1S);
12962       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SV);
12963       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2d, GLMULTITEXCOORD2D);
12964       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DV);
12965       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2f, GLMULTITEXCOORD2F);
12966       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FV);
12967       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2i, GLMULTITEXCOORD2I);
12968       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IV);
12969       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2s, GLMULTITEXCOORD2S);
12970       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SV);
12971       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3d, GLMULTITEXCOORD3D);
12972       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DV);
12973       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3f, GLMULTITEXCOORD3F);
12974       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FV);
12975       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3i, GLMULTITEXCOORD3I);
12976       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IV);
12977       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3s, GLMULTITEXCOORD3S);
12978       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SV);
12979       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4d, GLMULTITEXCOORD4D);
12980       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DV);
12981       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4f, GLMULTITEXCOORD4F);
12982       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FV);
12983       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4i, GLMULTITEXCOORD4I);
12984       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IV);
12985       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4s, GLMULTITEXCOORD4S);
12986       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SV);
12987       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixf, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXF);
12988       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixd, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXD);
12989       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixf, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXF);
12990       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixd, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXD);
12991       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSampleCoverage, GLSAMPLECOVERAGE);
12992       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage3D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE3D);
12993       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage2D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE2D);
12994       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage1D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE1D);
12995       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage3D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
12996       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage2D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE2D);
12997       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage1D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE1D);
12998       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetCompressedTexImage, GLGETCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE);
12999 
13000       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_version_1_3)
13001     }
13002     else
13003     {
13004       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
13005     }
13006   }
13007   
13008   void InitGL_ARB_imaging ()
13009   {
13010     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_imaging) return;
13011     if (!extstrGL) return;
13012     tested_CS_GL_ARB_imaging = true;
13013     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_imaging";
13014 
13015     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
13016     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
13017     
13018     CS_GL_ARB_imaging = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
13019 
13020     bool allclear, funcTest;
13021     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
13022     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_imaging;
13023     allclear = true;
13024     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
13025     {
13026       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTable, GLCOLORTABLE);
13027       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTableParameterfv, GLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFV);
13028       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTableParameteriv, GLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIV);
13029       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyColorTable, GLCOPYCOLORTABLE);
13030       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTable, GLGETCOLORTABLE);
13031       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTableParameterfv, GLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFV);
13032       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTableParameteriv, GLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIV);
13033       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorSubTable, GLCOLORSUBTABLE);
13034       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyColorSubTable, GLCOPYCOLORSUBTABLE);
13035       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionFilter1D, GLCONVOLUTIONFILTER1D);
13036       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionFilter2D, GLCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D);
13037       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameterf, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERF);
13038       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameterfv, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFV);
13039       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameteri, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERI);
13040       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameteriv, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIV);
13041       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyConvolutionFilter1D, GLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER1D);
13042       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyConvolutionFilter2D, GLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D);
13043       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionFilter, GLGETCONVOLUTIONFILTER);
13044       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionParameterfv, GLGETCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFV);
13045       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionParameteriv, GLGETCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIV);
13046       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetSeparableFilter, GLGETSEPARABLEFILTER);
13047       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSeparableFilter2D, GLSEPARABLEFILTER2D);
13048       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogram, GLGETHISTOGRAM);
13049       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogramParameterfv, GLGETHISTOGRAMPARAMETERFV);
13050       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogramParameteriv, GLGETHISTOGRAMPARAMETERIV);
13051       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmax, GLGETMINMAX);
13052       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmaxParameterfv, GLGETMINMAXPARAMETERFV);
13053       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmaxParameteriv, GLGETMINMAXPARAMETERIV);
13054       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glHistogram, GLHISTOGRAM);
13055       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMinmax, GLMINMAX);
13056       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glResetHistogram, GLRESETHISTOGRAM);
13057       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glResetMinmax, GLRESETMINMAX);
13058       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBlendColor, GLBLENDCOLOR);
13059       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBlendEquation, GLBLENDEQUATION);
13060 
13061       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_imaging)
13062     }
13063     else
13064     {
13065       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
13066     }
13067   }
13068   
13069   void InitGL_ARB_multitexture ()
13070   {
13071     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_multitexture) return;
13072     if (!extstrGL) return;
13073     tested_CS_GL_ARB_multitexture = true;
13074     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_multitexture";
13075 
13076     char cfgkey[26 + 19 + 1];
13077     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
13078     
13079     CS_GL_ARB_multitexture = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
13080 
13081     bool allclear, funcTest;
13082     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
13083     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_multitexture;
13084     allclear = true;
13085     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
13086     {
13087       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glActiveTextureARB, GLACTIVETEXTUREARB);
13088       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glClientActiveTextureARB, GLCLIENTACTIVETEXTUREARB);
13089       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DARB);
13090       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DVARB);
13091       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FARB);
13092       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FVARB);
13093       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IARB);
13094       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IVARB);
13095       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SARB);
13096       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SVARB);
13097       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DARB);
13098       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DVARB);
13099       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FARB);
13100       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FVARB);
13101       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IARB);
13102       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IVARB);
13103       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SARB);
13104       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SVARB);
13105       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DARB);
13106       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DVARB);
13107       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FARB);
13108       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FVARB);
13109       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IARB);
13110       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IVARB);
13111       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SARB);
13112       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SVARB);
13113       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DARB);
13114       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DVARB);
13115       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FARB);
13116       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FVARB);
13117       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IARB);
13118       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IVARB);
13119       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SARB);
13120       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SVARB);
13121 
13122       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_multitexture)
13123     }
13124     else
13125     {
13126       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
13127     }
13128   }
13129   
13130   void InitGL_ARB_transpose_matrix ()
13131   {
13132     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix) return;
13133     if (!extstrGL) return;
13134     tested_CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix = true;
13135     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_transpose_matrix";
13136 
13137     char cfgkey[26 + 23 + 1];
13138     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
13139     
13140     CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
13141 
13142     bool allclear, funcTest;
13143     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
13144     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix;
13145     allclear = true;
13146     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
13147     {
13148       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixfARB, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXFARB);
13149       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixdARB, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXDARB);
13150       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixfARB, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXFARB);
13151       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixdARB, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXDARB);
13152 
13153       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_transpose_matrix)
13154     }
13155     else
13156     {
13157       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
13158     }
13159   }
13160   
13161   void InitGL_ARB_multisample ()
13162   {
13163     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_multisample) return;
13164     if (!extstrGL) return;

13172

13176     allclear = true;
13177     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
13178     {

13682       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteProgramsARB, GLDELETEPROGRAMSARB);
13683       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenProgramsARB, GLGENPROGRAMSARB);
13684       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4dARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4DARB);
13685       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4dvARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4DVARB);
13686       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4fARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4FARB);
13687       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4fvARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4FVARB);
13688       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4dARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4DARB);
13689       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4dvARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4DVARB);
13690       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4fARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4FARB);
13691       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4fvARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4FVARB);
13692       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramEnvParameterdvARB, GLGETPROGRAMENVPARAMETERDVARB);
13693       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramEnvParameterfvARB, GLGETPROGRAMENVPARAMETERFVARB);
13694       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramLocalParameterdvARB, GLGETPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETERDVARB);
13695       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramLocalParameterfvARB, GLGETPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETERFVARB);
13696       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramivARB, GLGETPROGRAMIVARB);
13697       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramStringARB, GLGETPROGRAMSTRINGARB);
13698       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribdvARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBDVARB);
13699       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribfvARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBFVARB);
13700       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribivARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBIVARB);
13701       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribPointervARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBPOINTERVARB);
13702       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsProgramARB, GLISPROGRAMARB);
13703 
13704       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_vertex_program)
13705     }
13706     else
13707     {
13708       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
13709     }

14197   void InitGL_EXT_packed_pixels ()
14198   {
14199     if (tested_CS_GL_EXT_packed_pixels) return;
14200     if (!extstrGL) return;
14201     tested_CS_GL_EXT_packed_pixels = true;
14202     const char* ext = "GL_EXT_packed_pixels";
14203

14206     
14207     CS_GL_EXT_packed_pixels = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);

14214     {
14215

14790     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
14791     
14792     CS_GL_EXT_vertex_shader = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
14793 
14794     bool allclear, funcTest;
14795     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
14796     bool init = CS_GL_EXT_vertex_shader;
14797     allclear = true;
14798     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
14799     {
14800       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBeginVertexShaderEXT, GLBEGINVERTEXSHADEREXT);
14801       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glEndVertexShaderEXT, GLENDVERTEXSHADEREXT);

14806       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glShaderOp2EXT, GLSHADEROP2EXT);

16312       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2svMESA, GLWINDOWPOS2SVMESA);
16313       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2fvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS2FVMESA);
16314       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2dvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS2DVMESA);
16315       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3iMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3IMESA);
16316       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3sMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3SMESA);
16317       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3fMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3FMESA);
16318       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3dMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3DMESA);
16319       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3ivMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3IVMESA);
16320       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3svMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3SVMESA);
16321       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3fvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3FVMESA);
16322       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3dvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS3DVMESA);
16323       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4iMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4IMESA);
16324       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4sMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4SMESA);
16325       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4fMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4FMESA);
16326       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4dMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4DMESA);
16327       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4ivMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4IVMESA);
16328       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4svMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4SVMESA);
16329       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4fvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4FVMESA);
16330       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos4dvMESA, GLWINDOWPOS4DVMESA);
16331 
16332       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_MESA_window_pos)
16333     }
16334     else
16335     {

16337     }
16338   }

16848       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16849       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16850       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16851       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16852       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16853       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fColor4fNormal3fVertex4fSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX4FSUN);
16854       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fColor4fNormal3fVertex4fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX4FVSUN);
16855       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUIVERTEX3FSUN);
16856       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUIVERTEX3FVSUN);
16857       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4ubVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4UBVERTEX3FSUN);
16858       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4ubVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4UBVERTEX3FVSUN);
16859       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16860       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16861       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUINORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16862       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUINORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16863       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16864       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16865       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FSUN);
16866       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16867       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16868       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16869       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
16870       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
16871 
16872       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_SUN_vertex)
16873     }
16874     else
16875     {

16877     }
16878   }

16880   void InitGL_ARB_fragment_program ()
16881   {
16882     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program) return;
16883     if (!extstrGL) return;
16884     tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program = true;
16885     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_fragment_program";
16886 
16887     char cfgkey[26 + 23 + 1];
16888     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
16889     
16890     CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
16891 
16892     bool allclear, funcTest;
16893     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
16894     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program;
16895     allclear = true;
16896     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
16897     {
16898       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramStringARB, GLPROGRAMSTRINGARB);
16899       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindProgramARB, GLBINDPROGRAMARB);
16900       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteProgramsARB, GLDELETEPROGRAMSARB);
16901       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenProgramsARB, GLGENPROGRAMSARB);
16902       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4dARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4DARB);
16903       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4dvARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4DVARB);
16904       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4fARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4FARB);
16905       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4fvARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4FVARB);
16906       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4dARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4DARB);
16907       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4dvARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4DVARB);
16908       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4fARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4FARB);
16909       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4fvARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4FVARB);
16910       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramEnvParameterdvARB, GLGETPROGRAMENVPARAMETERDVARB);
16911       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramEnvParameterfvARB, GLGETPROGRAMENVPARAMETERFVARB);

16913       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramLocalParameterfvARB, GLGETPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETERFVARB);
16914       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramivARB, GLGETPROGRAMIVARB);
16915       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramStringARB, GLGETPROGRAMSTRINGARB);
16916       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsProgramARB, GLISPROGRAMARB);
16917 
16918       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_fragment_program)
16919     }
16920     else
16921     {
16922       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
16923     }
16924   }

17337   void InitWGL_EXT_pbuffer (HDC hDC)
17338   {
17339     if (tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer) return;
17340     tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer = true;
17341     const char* ext = "WGL_EXT_pbuffer";
17342     char cfgkey[26 + 15 + 1];
17343     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
17344     
17345     SetupWGLextStr (hDC);
17346     if (!extstrWGL) return;
17347     CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer = (strstr (extstrWGL, ext) != 0);
17348 
17349     bool allclear, funcTest;
17350     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
17351     bool init = CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer;
17352     allclear = true;
17353     if (init)
17354     {
17355       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglCreatePbufferEXT, WGLCREATEPBUFFEREXT);
17356       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglGetPbufferDCEXT, WGLGETPBUFFERDCEXT);
17357       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglReleasePbufferDCEXT, WGLRELEASEPBUFFERDCEXT);
17358       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglDestroyPbufferEXT, WGLDESTROYPBUFFEREXT);

17360 
17361       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("WGL", WGL_EXT_pbuffer)
17362       CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer &= allclear;
17363     }
17364     else
17365     {
17366       Report (msgExtNotFound, "WGL", ext);
17367     }
17368   }

17844   void InitGL_ARB_shader_objects ()
17845   {
17846     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects) return;
17847     if (!extstrGL) return;
17848     tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects = true;
17849     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_shader_objects";
17850 
17851     char cfgkey[26 + 21 + 1];
17852     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
17853     
17854     CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
17855 
17856     bool allclear, funcTest;
17857     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
17858     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects;
17859     allclear = true;
17860     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
17861     {

17910   void InitGL_ARB_fragment_shader ()
17911   {
17912     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader) return;
17913     if (!extstrGL) return;
17914     tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader = true;
17915     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_fragment_shader";
17916 
17917     char cfgkey[26 + 22 + 1];
17918     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
17919     
17920     CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
17921 
17922     bool allclear, funcTest;
17923     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
17924     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader;
17925     allclear = true;
17926     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
17927     {
17928 
17929       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_fragment_shader)
17930     }
17931     else
17932     {
17933       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
17934     }
17935   }

18006   
18007   void InitGL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object ()
18008   {
18009     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object) return;
18010     if (!extstrGL) return;
18011     tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object = true;
18012     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object";
18013     InitGL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object();
18014     if (!CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object)
18015     {
18016       Report (msgDependencyNotFound, "GL", ext, "GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object");
18017       return;
18018     }
18019     char cfgkey[26 + 26 + 1];
18020     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
18021     
18022     CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
18023 
18024     bool allclear, funcTest;
18025     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
18026     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object;
18027     allclear = true;
18028     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
18029     {
18030 
18031       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object)
18032     }
18033     else
18034     {
18035       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
18036     }
18037   }
